TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegisterAttribute extends System.Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Constructor | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.All)

Docs.summary: This API supports the MonoDroid infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.para: The RegisterAttribute is used by the monodroid.exe tool to control Java proxy generation. Actual member values and semantics are subject to change with minimal notice; do not use this attribute.

Docs.summary: The internal method to use to connect JNI native declarations to the corresponding managed implementations.
Docs.value: A containing an internal method to use for JNI plumbing.

Docs.summary: Whether an Android Callable Wrapper should be generated for the type.
Docs.value: If , then Android Callable Wrappers will not be generated for the type; otherwise, Android Callable Wrappers will be generated (the default).

remarks.para: This property is only used for [Register] attributes placed on classes which inherit .
Set the DoNotGenerateAcw property when declaring a type that "aliases" a Java type -- that is, it has the same name as a Java type -- and an Android Callable Wrapper should not be generated.

Docs.summary: The name of the coresponding Android type or member.
Docs.value: A containing the JNI name of the corresponding Android type or member.

Docs.summary: The signature of the coresponding Android member.
Docs.value: A containing the JNI signature of the corresponding Android member.
